tree.description: An example journey showcasing how you can create an MFA device with an assigned name.

9691e523-409e-498d-922d-b218369b9e9d.name: Get Current Device Name
9691e523-409e-498d-922d-b218369b9e9d.description: Retrieve the Current Device Name from Transient State and populate it in Shared State for use in a Next-Gen script.

bd3ba057-7f62-4096-ac1a-d966842c2299.name: Update MFA Device Name
bd3ba057-7f62-4096-ac1a-d966842c2299.description: Takes the nodeState deviceKey object, prompts the user for a user-friendly name of the device and then saves that device using that name.

tree.description: An example journey showcasing how you can enable a user to List, Add, Rename, and Remove MFA devices.

message.en: No MFA devices found. Would you like to register a new one?

pageDescription.en: Select what action youâ€™d like to perform on your MFA device.

c65bf565-adc0-45cd-82b9-368499a5eeae.name: Select MFA Device
c65bf565-adc0-45cd-82b9-368499a5eeae.description: Given an existing user, allow them to select from a list of their existing MFA devices.

bd3ba057-7f62-4096-ac1a-d966842c2299.name: Update MFA Device Name
bd3ba057-7f62-4096-ac1a-d966842c2299.description: Takes the nodeState deviceKey object, prompts the user for a user-friendly name of the device and then saves that device using that name.

41f886d4-402e-4e04-96d0-b0180b3dd11f.name: Remove MFA Device
41f886d4-402e-4e04-96d0-b0180b3dd11f.description: Given the Selected MFA Device, remove that device from the user's profile.

0896d82f-40ff-481b-9cae-3910235f2a1b.name: Display MFA Device Selection Message
0896d82f-40ff-481b-9cae-3910235f2a1b.description: Displays an Information message to the user indicating what MFA device they have selected.
